markdownRemark.html:
I love a good PHP rant as much as anyone, and this one delivers:

PHP performance is abysmal without caching. Does anyone sell a commercial caching product for PHP? Oh, look, the designers of PHP do.

frontmatter.title: A Fancy Calendar Icon With Just CSS & HTML
